General.Name: Jiangsu Aucksun Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Azure Corporation engages in lithium battery, LED chips, and metal logistics and distribution businesses in China. It is involved in the research and development, production, and sale of lithium battery products that are used in small power systems, electric bicycles/motorcycles, cleaning appliances, portable and household energy storage, and other products. The company also engages in the research and development, and manufacture of LED epitaxial wafers and chips. In addition, it engages in the warehousing, sorting, tailoring, packaging, distribution, and processing of steel and aluminum plates, as well as provides supply chain management services. Further, the company is involved in manufacturing and installation of lighting lamps; and processing, storage, and sales of metal materials. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Aucksun Co., Ltd. Jiangsu Azure Corporation was founded in 2007 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.
General.Address: No.10, Xinjing Middle Road, Zhangjiagang, China, 215618
